brainly_data.question: The kangaroo rat is able to get all of the water it needs through its food and, therefore, never needs to drink liquids. this animal has adapted to survive in which biome?
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: The kangaroo rat is able to get all of the water it needs through its food and, therefore, never needs to drink liquids. this animal has adapted to survive in which biome?
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text:
For the answer to the question above, this kind of ability of animals that posses is more likely living in the  "desert."

This kind of animals adapted to this kind of less water environment like the desert in which rain is less than 2 inches a year.
